Interface IApplicationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicationService
public interface IApplicationService

  • Method Details

    • loadApplications

      Map<String,BTOApplication> loadApplications(List<Project> projects)
      Loads BTO application data from persistent storage (e.g., CSV file).
      Parameters:
      projects - A list of all Project objects, used for unit count adjustments.
      Returns:
      A map of ApplicationID to BTOApplication objects representing all loaded applications.

    • saveApplications

      void saveApplications(Map<String,BTOApplication> applications)
      Saves the provided map of BTO applications to persistent storage. Overwrites the existing application data file.
      Parameters:
      applications - A map of ApplicationID to BTOApplication objects to be saved.

    • findApplicationById

      BTOApplication findApplicationById(String applicationId)
      Finds a BTO application by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to find.
      Returns:
      The BTOApplication object if found, or null otherwise.

    • findApplicationByApplicantAndProject

      BTOApplication findApplicationByApplicantAndProject(String nric, String projectName)
      Finds a specific BTO application based on the applicant's NRIC and the project name. Assumes a standard Application ID format (e.g., NRIC_ProjectName).
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      projectName - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      The BTOApplication object if found, or null otherwise.

    • getApplicationsByProject

      List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsByProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves a list of all BTO applications submitted for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOApplication objects for the specified project. Returns an empty list if projectName is null or no applications are found.

    • getApplicationsByStatus

      List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsByStatus(ApplicationStatus status)
      Retrieves a list of all BTO applications that currently have a specific status.
      Parameters:
      status - The ApplicationStatus to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOApplication objects with the specified status. Returns an empty list if status is null or no applications match.

    • getApplicationsByApplicant

      List<BTOApplication> getApplicationsByApplicant(String nric)
      Retrieves a list of all BTO applications submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of BTOApplication objects submitted by the specified applicant. Returns an empty list if nric is null or no applications are found.

    • addApplication

      void addApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Adds a new BTO application to the service's internal map. Should perform checks to prevent adding duplicates (based on application ID).
      Parameters:
      application - The BTOApplication object to add.

    • removeApplication

      boolean removeApplication(String applicationId)
      Removes a BTO application from the service's internal map based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the application was found and removed, false otherwise.

    • getAllApplications

      Map<String,BTOApplication> getAllApplications()
      Retrieves a map containing all BTO applications currently managed by the service.
      Returns:
      A map of ApplicationID to BTOApplication objects.
